message.body: did you make it back?
I DID!
Almost home!
Definitely leave 2 hours early!
Lines were crazy!
oh no! which way did you go? so you left at 9:30 to get there by 11:30? my flights at 1:30
I went the "long" way because I got nervous about the suitcase. The train was easy, took maybe 45 minutes.
but once I got there I was in line forever
I ran and bought macaroons then got right on the plane no food!
omg! did they give you food? I guess I should but cheese here since it opens at 10. you think I should also leave at 9:30? glad ur almost home
My flight was at 1:20 so it might be smart. I kinda heard a french conversation and it sounded like it wasn't normal to be that crowded.
They have mustard and jams at the airport!
How was the hunting museum!?
mustard would be great and I have too many euros! is there cheese? probly not vacuum sealed
hunting museum was great!! and I walked around Le marais and saw the centre Pompidou and got a falafel and say in a beautiful crowded park
Yay!!! Sounds so fun! I didn't see any cheese but you igjt find some!
Hope so! I ended up just taking all 3 drawings (didn't pay) and can't fit them in my suitcase!
haha I really can't!
the art teacher was so annoying
Lol. Awesome. Smoosh Em in!!!
Oh no did she yell at you?
she spoke to me like a child and said please write in this scrap book. and I acted like a teenager and didn't know what she was talking about. ended up writing in it after being chastised.
Lol. She was a wack job.
What did you write?!
I said I enjoyed the diversity of the films and the locations but that may they should show twice and move vod to its own room
*location
I felt lame for not going to the festival bar but didn't seem like many people were going. they should have kept the hanging out to the theater
houtan's not home yet
Date went well!
haha yeah! do you think he may not come home?
No way he has work!
I know but it's 1 am! he could come back in the morning to change
